credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: "Teaser" Announcement Poster for The Matrix Reloaded
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
medium: Engraving on holographic foil printed laid down on heavy white wove paper
description: Over black background, vertically-oriented running strips of digital data in neon green blanket the space like rain. Center along the vertical axis, three inscriptions appear: (1)"FREE YOUR MIND"; (2)"05.15"; (3)"www.thematrix.com"; followed by three logos of the sponsoring companies, arranged horizontally along the bottom margin.
name: Poster
